  • accept: specifies the types of files that the server accepts, * the setting only works with HTML5 supported browsers (since ZK 7.0.0).
    • - *
  • suppressed_errors: specifies the suppressed uploading errors, separated by | (e.g. missing-required-component|illegal-upload) (since ZK 9.5.1). + *

timeline.author: scribetw
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -56,6 +57,39 @@
 	 * or null or "false" to disable the file download (and then
 	 * this button behaves like a normal button).
 	 * @since 5.0.0
+	 * @see Error
 	 */
 	void setUpload(String upload);
+
+	/**
+	 * Uploading error constants.
+	 * @since 9.5.1
+	 */
+	enum Error {
+		/**
+		 * (missing-required-component) Missing required component or data.
+		 */
+		MISSING_REQUIRED_COMPONENT,
+		/**
+		 * (illegal-upload) Illegal upload method.
+		 */
+		ILLEGAL_UPLOAD,
+		/**
+		 * (server-out-of-server) Server temporarily out of service.
+		 */
+		SERVER_OUT_OF_SERVER,

+++ b/zk/src/org/zkoss/zk/ui/ext/Uploadable.java

@@ -75,9 +75,9 @@ public interface Uploadable {
 		 */

-		 * (server-out-of-server) Server temporarily out of service.

 		/**
